steps.title: Lives (tries)
steps.description:
Here you can see your three available lives,
which will go down by one in case you make a
mistake.

But do not worry, if you run out of lives the track
will simply change and you will have your lives
refilled.

steps.title: Time signature number
steps.description:
After you successfully complete the task, the time
signature of the song will appear in this window.

steps.title: Music progress bar
steps.description:
This is the music progress bar. You can drag the playhead
to the play the soundtrack from the specific part you want.

steps.title: Play/pause button
steps.description:
Click this button to start the soundtrack/music, and stop it
whenever needed. Now let's click it and start playing.

steps.title: First correct dot
steps.description:
It seems like the time signature for this track is 4,
which is the number of beats in one bar. This means
ou will need to choose the very first beat of each bar.
Now let's click on this dot and see what happens.

Good job! The green means you are right, now go
ahead and click on all the correct beats remaining.

trackFailed.header: You failed 3 times, try again on another track.
